Name: Topdown Showdown
About the game: Topdown Showdown is a smash inspired fighting game with a top down perspective. Dodge, combo, and knock your opponents out of the arena, from any angle! Choose from a roster of 17 characters in local or online versus 1v1 play. Fast, aggressive game-play style designed to promote diverse and skillful combos hidden beneath a simple control scheme Rollback netcode
